price: que los azotó durante siete noches y ocho días ininterrumpidamente. La gente quedó tendida, sin vida, como troncos huecos de palmeras derribadas.
arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: sakharahā ʿalayhim sabʿa layālin wathamāniyata ayyāmin ḥusūman fatarā al-qawma fīhā ṣarʿā ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin khāwiyatin
